info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:04AM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. * WHERE...In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau. In Colorado, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions due to icy and snowpacked roadways with areas of heavy snowfall and blowing snow impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
